ne18:2.1: Yo dhammo yaṁ dhammaṁ janayati, tassa so parikkhāro.
ne18:2.4: Dve dhammā janayanti hetu ca paccayo ca.
ne18:2.8: Yathā aṅkurassa nibbattiyā bījaṁ asādhāraṇaṁ, pathavī āpo ca sādhāraṇā.
ne18:2.9: Aṅkurassa hi pathavī āpo ca paccayo sabhāvo hetu.
ne18:2.10: Yathā vā pana ghaṭe duddhaṁ pakkhittaṁ dadhi bhavati, na catthi ekakālasamavadhānaṁ duddhassa ca dadhissa ca.
ne18:2.11: Evamevaṁ natthi ekakālasamavadhānaṁ hetussa ca paccayassa ca.
ne18:3.2: Vuttaṁ hi avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṁ, evaṁ sabbo paṭiccasamuppādo.
ne18:3.3: Iti avijjā avijjāya hetu ayoniso manasikāro paccayo.
ne18:3.5: Tattha purimikā avijjā avijjānusayo pacchimikā avijjā avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ, purimiko avijjānusayo pacchimikassa avijjāpariyuṭṭhānassa hetubhūto paribrūhanāya, bījaṅkuro viya samanantarahetutāya.
ne18:3.6: Yaṁ pana yattha phalaṁ nibbattati, idamassa paramparahetutāya hetubhūtaṁ.
ne18:3.7: Duvidho hi hetu samanantarahetu paramparahetu ca, evaṁ avijjāyapi duvidho hetu samanantarahetu paramparahetu ca.
ne18:4.1: Yathā vā pana thālakañca vaṭṭi ca telañca padīpassa paccayabhūtaṁ na sabhāvahetu, na hi sakkā thālakañca vaṭṭiñca telañca anaggikaṁ dīpetuṁ padīpassa paccayabhūtaṁ.
ne18:5.1: Avupacchedattho santati attho, nibbatti attho phalattho, paṭisandhi attho punabbhavattho, palibodhattho pariyuṭṭhānattho, asamugghātattho anusayattho, asampaṭivedhattho avijjattho, apariññātattho viññāṇassa bījattho.
ne18:5.2: Yattha avupacchedo tattha santati, yattha santati tattha nibbatti, yattha nibbatti tattha phalaṁ, yattha phalaṁ tattha paṭisandhi, yattha paṭisandhi tattha punabbhavo, yattha punabbhavo tattha palibodho, yattha palibodho tattha pariyuṭṭhānaṁ, yattha pariyuṭṭhānaṁ tattha asamugghāto.
ne18:5.3: Yattha asamugghāto tattha anusayo, yattha anusayo tattha asampaṭivedho, yattha asampaṭivedho tattha avijjā, yattha avijjā tattha sāsavaṁ viññāṇaṁ apariññātaṁ, yattha sāsavaṁ viññāṇaṁ apariññātaṁ tattha bījattho.
ne18:6.1: Sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandhassa paccayo, samādhikkhandho paññākkhandhassa paccayo, paññākkhandho vimuttikkhandhassa paccayo, vimuttikkhandho vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhassa paccayo.
ne18:6.2: Titthaññutā pītaññutāya paccayo, pītaññutā pattaññutāya paccayo, pattaññutā attaññutāya paccayo.
ne18:7.1: Yathā vā pana cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ.
ne18:7.2: Tattha cakkhu ādhipateyyapaccayatāya paccayo, rūpā ārammaṇapaccayatāya paccayo.
ne18:7.3: Āloko sannissayatāya paccayo, manasikāro sabhāvo hetu.
ne18:7.19: Evaṁ yo koci upanissayo sabbo so parikkhāro.
ne18:7.20: Tenāha āyasmā mahākaccāyano “ye dhammā yaṁ dhammaṁ janayantī”ti.
